subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
Basketball
Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: North Carolina guard Dexter Strickland stayed within inches of Kentucky guard Brandon Knight all game, but was unable to keep the talented freshmen from scoring a game-high 22 points.
snippet: North Carolina guard Dexter Strickland stayed within inches of Kentucky guard Brandon Knight all game, but was unable to keep the talented freshmen from scoring a game-high 22 points.
